attributes.action: recognise Timmy Mallett in the New Years Honours list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Timmy Mallet is one of this country's great excentrics, and has been one of our most popular television personalities since the early 1980s. 
I believe that he should be recognised for his contribution to children's entertainment and services to broadcasting over the last 25 years.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
